model.marker

Class AbstractLocationMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.AbstractMarker
      • de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.SimplePointMarker
        • model.marker.AbstractLocationMarker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.Marker, CustomizedMarker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AirportMarker, CityMarker

    public abstract class AbstractLocationMarker
extends de.fhpotsdam.unfolding.marker.SimplePointMarker
implements CustomizedMarker

    AbstractLocationMarker

    An Abstract Class that define the common behaviour for city markers or Locaiton Markers

    Since:
    22/7/2019
    See Also:
    CityMarker, CustomizedMarker
